product_name: Columbia Super Bonehead Sleeveless Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made of soft, lightweight cotton poplin with UPF 30 sun protection, the women's Columbia Super Bonehead Sleeveless Shirt is designed to meet the needs of active hikers and anglers alike. 100% cotton poplin shirt keeps you cool and protected from harmful UV rays, whether on the water or hiking ridgelines. Angler-specific features include 4 fly-box pockets and a rod holder loop at the chest. Mesh-lined vents at back shoulders increase airflow. Extended sun-protection collar flips up for extra coverage. Columbia Super Bonehead Shirt for women features a relaxed fit and is garment washed for instant comfort. Closeout.
short_description: Made of soft, lightweight cotton poplin with UPF 30 sun protection, the women's Columbia Super Bonehead Sleeveless Shirt is designed to meet the needs of active hikers and anglers alike.
